channel.title: Blog on Thai Tran
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Thai Tran

item.title: Vim Tips
item.description: I have been using vim / vim shortcut for nearly everything (Intellij, tmux, chrome browser). These are several tips that I used for everyday ’s action. My vim configuration is here https://github.com/bubuzzz/my-vim. I cannot remember which plugins that makes the below shortcut effective, thus please checkout my configuration before following the tips ^ to jump to beginning of the line. $ to jump to the end of the line. dd to delete the line (use it too much and this makes the D on my mac keyboard is faded away already).

item.title: Hello Hugo
item.description: Switch to Hugo from now on

item.title: Unpredictable Future
item.description: 2017 was a bit weird since I had to involve to many things. Things started to be a mess and became unpredictable. Oh, a guy asked me: You can predict the future? So this is the answer: Yes (and hopefully you can read it here). My current situation: Working full time for a company, working partime with a good mate, preparing my own startup up and running in the end of this year while staying in a foreign country, under the rush of changing my nationality before next year.
